column4: I am using ubuntu's default cd/dvd burner to burn a dvd with gutsy amd64. Do I choose 'Write to Disc: CDDVD TS-H653N' or 'Write to Disc: File Image'
You can either write directly to a disk or write to a file image (.iso file).
Burning an ISO file to another ISO file would be a rather pointless exercise. Write to the disc.
